After watching this movie, I couldn't help but notice the parallels between it and another film called America 3000. Both were very bad mid 1980's scifi movies that feature a girl who fantasizes about robots (like Wall-e) making her life better. In both cases she risks everything to escape into a Utopia like one ruled by robots.
The only difference was that in America 3000, her boyfriend comes along as his role is diminished.

The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Galaxy beyond.
